resources.string: Resaltar no taboleiro (última xogada e xaque)
Destino das pezas (xogadas válidas e premovementos)
Inicial (en inglés) da peza (K, Q, R, B, N)

string.name: zenMode
string.comment:
zenMode
This is not the religious meaning. Turning this option on takes away make elements of the user interface.
Can also translate as 'Focus mode' as one example.

resources.string: Isto permite ocultar todas as puntuacións do sitio, para axudar a centrarse no xadrez. As partidas poden ser puntuadas, isto só afecta ó que podes ver.
Mostrar o control de redimensionamento do taboleiro

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

resources.string: Aviso cando se esgota o tempo

string.name: gameBehavior
string.comment:
gameBehavior
In the user settings page, "Game behavior" is the title of the tab for configuring how the player can interact with the game.

resources.string: Pinchando na casilla de orixe e despois na de destino
Premovementos (xogar durante o tempo do teu rival)
Mantén pulsada a tecla <ctrl> ao coroar para desactivar temporalmente a promoción automática
Automaticamente reclamar táboas por triple repetición
Confirmar abandono e ofertas de táboas

string.name: snapArrowsToValidMoves
string.comment:
snapArrowsToValidMoves
The 'arrows' are for quick annotations you can do on the board, by holding right mouse button. With this setting enabled, it means the arrows will align themselves to places were pieces can move.

string.name: sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
string.comment:
sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
When enabled, this setting will automatically send 'Good game, well played' to your opponent if you are lose or draw the game. It's meant as a courtesy message.
The message will be sent in ENGLISH.
It is up to you how to deal with this. For example, you may want to put '(message will be sent in English)' in your translated text as one example. Or you can leave the actual English text and put a brief translation in your own language.

resources.string: Dicir \"Good game, well played\" (Boa partida, ben xogada) ao perder ou empatar
Usa a roda do rato pra amosar os movementos
Notificación diaria por email coas túas partidas por correspondencia
Nova mensaxe na caixa do correo
Pouco tempo restante na partida por correspondencia
Notificación no dispositivo cando non esteas en Lichess

string.name: bellNotificationSound
string.comment:
bellNotificationSound
Preference on https://lichess.org/account/preferences/notification
Allows players to enable/disable this sound played when receiving a bell notification (e.g. for getting mentioned in the forum or invited to a study).
